text: Sugar Hill Records Parent company Welk Music Group Founded 1978 Founder(s) Barry Poss Distributing label Sugar Hill Records (In the US) Genre(s) folk music, bluegrass music, country music Country US Web address sugarhillrecords.com Sugar Hill Records is a folk music record label. Some of the artists who have released albums with the label are Nickel Creek, Allison Moorer, Sam Bush and Dolly Parton. Category:Folk music Category:Independent record labels
title: Sugar Hill Records
